segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn't even see the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless he's being, standing on that wobbly stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, taken cookies when they're not supposed to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she's standing right in the middle of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone should really do something about all this, but who?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is all so frustrating to watch, like a train wreck in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon, before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
